# NSMetadataItemPathKey | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Foundation ](/documentation/foundation)

- [ NSMetadataItemPathKey ](/documentation/Foundation/NSMetadataItemPathKey)

-  NSMetadataItemPathKey 

Global Variable# NSMetadataItemPathKey

iOS 5.0+iPadOS 5.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.7+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
let NSMetadataItemPathKey: String
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/Foundation/NSMetadataItemPathKey#Discussion)

The value is an [`NSString`](/documentation/foundation/nsstring) object that contains the full path to the file
